Description: Granodiorite statue of Sekhmet, wearing sun-disc and holding a lotus-sceptre, lower section and part of right arm damaged. The grey granite is full of distinct crystals of pink granite.
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 2007 9 Mar-10 Jun, Beijing, The Palace Museum, 'Britain Meets the World: 1714-1830'
Acquisition notes: Erroneously entered as being from the 1835 collection. Salt's Sekhmets were all in the first collection. [NCS 9/2/05].
